metadata.title: CVE-2017-12938 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: UnRAR before 5.5.7 allows remote attackers to bypass a directory-traversal protection mechanism via vectors involving a symlink to the . directory, a symlink to the .. directory, and a regular file.

criterions.comment: unrar-nonfree package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:5.5.8-1').
